Description.val:
DRP:
This effort is to procure, install and configure critical Maritime Intelligence applications to include servers and remaining storage systems at the Eastern Disaster Recovery Center (DRC).

Fleet SCI IT:
This effort is to deliver and sustain SCI network access and information technology tools to the Naval Intelligence Community ashore.  This includes desktop hardware, software, and peripherals, network equipment, server hardware and software, video teleconferencing devices, secure voice over IP telephones.

Name.val: 7) Solid State disk shelves and flash cashe
